content: df.distinctBy { age and name } // same as df.groupBy { age and name }.mapToRows { group.first() } val age by column<Int>() val name by columnGroup() val firstName by name.column<String>() df.distinctBy { age and name } // same as df.groupBy { age and name }.mapToRows { group.first() } df.distinctBy("age", "name") // same as df.groupBy("age", "name").mapToRows { group.first() }
